processinfo.p: This selection has been made by the editor as part of the "INFORMATOR O ZASOBIE ARCHIWALNYM INSTYTUTU PAMIĘCI NARODOWEJ" book
which subjects were excluded. EHRI has made a selection of relevant collections, excluding non-holocaust relevant material
